text: Kuch log kahenge ke woh teen thay aur chutha (fourth) unka kutta tha aur kuch dusre keh denge ke paanch thay aur chatta(sixth) unka kutta tha. Yeh sab betuki (irrelevant guesses) haankte hain. Kuch aur log kehte hain ke saat (seven) thay aur aathwa (eighth) unka kutta tha. Kaho, mere Rubb hi behtar jaanta hai ke woh kitne thay, kam hi log unki saheeh tadaad jaante hain, pas tum sar-sari baat se badhkar unki tadaad ke maamle mein logon se behas na karo, aur na unke mutaaliq kisi se kuch pucho
